reviewText: This movie is stupendous in all aspects. It is beautifully orcestrated and the actors were magnificent in each of their parts. If you want to witness the story of the phantom actually come alive then do not miss out on this beautiful production. It is true to the story.
Fantastic show! Just as beautiful if I were in the theater with the original!
A visually beautiful movie with some of the best musical performances recorded.
movie was really interesting, held my attention to the end..however the sad ending  had me almost in tears...hoped she would stay with him I suppose...anyway the movie was great.

Ive seen this play in New York many times. I try to see it every time I go to New York. Its my favorite. I love the movie because it shows us some of the phantoms past which of play is unable to do. Its also beautifully done. I highly recommend this to anyone who hasn't seen it yet.
My copy is practically new - great seller !
Not much to say other than I loved the movie and Emmy Rossum's singing.  She has such a beautiful voice!
I fell in love with the 3 major characters....Butler, Rossom, and young man are great.  Songs will recur in my mind often.
It doesn't get any better, enjoyed so many times on Broadway and now on DVD.
Great Movie..kinda  of miss Colm Wilkenson but great job all around.  Delivery and packaging done well.
It will not play on my DVD player because it has the wrong regional code.
